body:
I really want to make a map, but i don't have a server i could build on that has world edit. any one has a server i could build on that has world edit?



    kthxbai

title: Map making

replies.body: You can get world edit for single player as a mod.
replies.body_tagged: You can get world edit for single player as a mod.

replies.body: Steven have a public server (as i know) where you can build. Just add him on skype and ask him for the IP ^_^
